text: Adam's Rib is a 1949 American romantic comedy movie directed by George Cukor and starring Spencer Tracy, Katharine Hepburn, Judy Holliday, Tom Ewell, David Wayne, Jean Hagen, Hope Emerson. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1951. It was also adapted into a TV series in 1973. ==Other websites== * * Category:1949 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by George Cukor Category:Movies adapted into television series
title: Adam's Rib
